hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:I offered with Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) a two rak`at prayer before the Zuhr prayer and two rak`at after the Zuhr prayer, two rak`at after Jumua, Maghrib and `Isha' prayers

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّطَوُّعِ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
chapter.eng-name: What is recited in the two Rak'a (Sunna) of the Fajr
